Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Transfiguration:

Text.Language: Marenhwc e~P,#c# Pennou]: pio~mooucioc nem Viwt: v/etafyamio~ qen tefmeynou]: n~n/etwnq nem nirefmwout.
Let us praise Christ, our God: the One in Essence with the Father: who, through His divinity, made: the living and the dead.
فلنسبح المسيح إلهنا المساوى مع الآب فى الجوهر الذى خلق بلاهوته الأحياء والأموات.
I/#c# P,#c# pimonogen/c: afsenaf cap~swi m~pitwou n~Yabwr: af[i nemaf n~nefmay/t/c: Petroc nem Iakwboc nem Iwann/c.
Jesus Christ, the only-begotten: went up to the top of Mount Tabor: He took with Him His disciples: Peter and James and John.
يسوع المسيح الوحيد صعد فوق جبل تابور وأخذ معه تلاميذه بطرس ويعقوب ويوحنا.
Ouoh af[i,ereb m~poum~yo: pefho nafe~rouwini e~hote v~r/: nefh~bwc m~v~r/] n~ou,iwn: pip~rov/t/c 2 auouwnh naf.
And He appeared before them: His face shone more than the sun: His clothes looked like snow: and the two prophets appeared to Him.
وتجلى أمامهم وكان وجهه يلمع أكثر من الشمس وثيابه مثل الثلج وظهر له النبيان.
?liac nem Mwu~c/c petjor: aunau e~nefh~bwc hi Yabwr: nimay/t/c auerjinior: n~ou[/pi ecerouwini.
Elijah and Moses, the strong: saw His clothes on Tabor: the disciples passed: through a bright cloud.
نظر إيليا وموسى القوى ثيابه فوق جبل تابور وعبر التلاميذ سحابة نيرة.
Ouoh ic ouc~m/ e~bol qen t~ve: e~bolhiten Vnou] Viwt: je vai pe Pas/ri pamenrit: aferpaouws cwtem n~cwf.
And, behold, there was a voice from heaven: coming from God, the Father: saying, “This is My beloved Son: He has done My will, listen to Him.”
وإذا بصوت من السماء من عند الله الآب قائلاً هذا هو إبنى حبيبى قد صنع ارادتى فاسمعوا له.
Tenhwc e~rof ten]wou naf: tenerhouo~ [ici m~mof: hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai.
We praise and glorify Him: and exalt Him above all: as the Good One and Lover of Mankind: have mercy on us according to Your great mercy.
نسبحه ونمجده ونزيده علواً كصالح ومحب البشر إرحمنا كعظيم رحمتك.
All/louia all/louia: all/louia all/louia: I/#c# P,#c# Ps/ri m~V]: afswbt e~jen pitwou n~Yabwr.
Alleluia Alleluia: Alleluia Alleluia: Jesus Christ, the Son of God: was transfigured on Mount Tabor.
الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح إبن الله تجلى على جبل تابور.
